reviewText: Purchased for my Dad for Father's Day. Very fitting gift for a great Dad! He loved it and is sharing it with others.
Fun to look at our life and find some things to laugh at.  You can feel D. Swanbergs love for his parents.

Dennis nails southern church culture's humor, as well as reminding us of our Heavenly Father's heart for us.  Without being "preached at" we understand more about love, humility, and service than the typical straightforward message from a pulpit.
It was very refreshing.  I loved hearing about a man  who had so much love and respect for his father.  Glad to hear a good Southern Baptist minister can be a "man of God" as well as a comedian.
My husband and my friends have all enjoyed this product.  It's very funny and true to form.  He's the best comedian I've seen in many years.  Thanks for making our day
